name: crudely

crudely adverb
(SIMPLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is simple and not skilfully done or made: a crudely made bomb Would-be authors have been crudely printing their own books for years.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hut was crudely built, with a thatched roof.He illustrated the book with his own crudely drawn cartoons.Put crudely, government has become a lot less scary, and corporations have become a lot more so.
